entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning early in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
